--mbx-selector-background-light.description: Selector background when dark mode is off

--mbx-selector-background-dark.description: Selector background when dark mode is on

--mbx-selector-text-color-light.description: Selector text color when dark mode is off

--mbx-selector-text-color-dark.description: Selector text color when dark mode is on

--mbx-selector-background-hover-light.description: Selector background when dark mode is off, on hover

--mbx-selector-background-hover-dark.description: Selector background when dark mode is on, on hover

--mbx-selector-text-color-hover-light.description: Selector text color when dark mode is off, on hover

--mbx-selector-text-color-hover-dark.description: Selector text color when dark mode is on, on hover
